content.rendered:
Hello, I had a strange dream a few days ago…

I dreamed that I was cheating on my partner, not in the sense of sexual intercourse, but that I love another person or love my partner and this person..

This person I dreamed of was about 1 year ago, more or less, my crush, I spoke to him once and we looked into each other’s eyes several times while passing each other fleetingly… (at school, I’m 21)

Now I dream about him that I cheat on my current partner with him or well actually love both in the dream and have to decide, I started crying in his dream because my former crush forced me to decide… I’m in woke up confused at that moment. Need help interpreting dream.

excerpt.rendered: Hello, I had a strange dream a few days ago… I dreamed that I was cheating on my partner, not
